original_text: The preacher sought to find out acceptable words: and that which was written was upright, even words of truth.
korean_text: 전도자는 힘써 아름다운 말들을 구하였나니 진리의 말씀들을 정직하게 기록하였느니라

sentences.original_text: The preacher sought to find out acceptable words
sentences.korean_translation: 설교자가 받아들일 수 있는 말을 찾으려고 했다

sentences.original_text: and that which was written was upright
